verses.verse: And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> were <S%H3615>finished<s%>, and all the host of <S%H6635>them<s%>.

And on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> his <S%H4399>work<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made<s%>; and he <S%H7673>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> from all his <S%H4399>work<s%> which he had <S%H6213>made<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> <S%H3588>it<s%>; because that in it he <S%H7673>rested<s%> from all his <S%H4399>work<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H1254>created<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%>.

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and of the <S%H776>earth<s%> when they were <S%H1254>created<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

And no <S%H7880>plant<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> was <S%H2962>yet<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and no <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> had <S%H2962>yet<s%> sprung <S%H6779>up<s%>; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3808>not<s%> caused it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and there was <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H5647>till<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%>;
but there went <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H108>mist<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> the whole <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%>, and <S%H5301>breathed<s%> into his <S%H639>nostrils<s%> the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>; and <S%H120>man<s%> became a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H6924>eastward<s%>, in <S%H5731>Eden<s%>; and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3335>formed<s%>.

And <S%H4480>out<s%> of the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H6779>made<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> every <S%H6086>tree<s%> that is <S%H2530>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H4758>sight<s%>, and <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food<s%>; the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> also in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%>, and the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H1847>the<s%> knowledge of <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>.

And a <S%H5104>river<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H1588>garden<s%>; and from thence it was <S%H6504>parted<s%>, and became <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%>.

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> is <S%H6376>Pishon<s%>: <S%H1931>that<s%> is it which <S%H5437>compasseth<s%> the whole <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2341>Havilah<s%>, <S%H834>where<s%> there is <S%H2091>gold<s%>;
and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>: there is <S%H916>bdellium<s%> and the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>.
And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H1521>Gihon<s%>: the same is it that <S%H5437>compasseth<s%> the whole <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H2313>Hiddekel<s%>: that is it which goeth in <S%H1980>front<s%> <S%H6926>of<s%> <S%H804>Assyria<s%>. And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is the <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%>, and put <S%H3240>him<s%> into the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to <S%H5647>dress<s%> it and to keep <S%H8104>it<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Of every <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> thou mayest <S%H398>freely<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%>:

but of the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H398>eat<s%> of <S%H3117>it<s%>: for in the day that thou <S%H398>eatest<s%> thereof thou shalt <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> that the <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6213>alone<s%>; I will make him a help meet for <S%H5828>him<s%>.

And out of the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and every <S%H5775>bird<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; and <S%H935>brought<s%> them unto the man to <S%H7200>see<s%> what he would <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H120>them<s%>: and whatsoever the man <S%H7121>called<s%> every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature<s%>, <S%H1931>that<s%> was the name <S%H8034>thereof<s%>.

And the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7121>gave<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%> to all <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and to every <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>; but for <S%H120>man<s%> there was not <S%H4672>found<s%> a help meet for <S%H5828>him<s%>.

And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5307>caused<s%> a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon the <S%H121>man<s%>, and he <S%H3462>slept<s%>; and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H6763>ribs<s%>, and closed <S%H5462>up<s%> the flesh instead <S%H1320>thereof<s%>:

and the <S%H6763>rib<s%>, which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> from the <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H1129>made<s%> he a <S%H802>woman<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> her unto the <S%H120>man<s%>.

And the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H2063>This<s%> is <S%H6471>now<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%> of my <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of my <S%H1320>flesh<s%>: <S%H2063>she<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H802>Woman<s%>, because <S%H2063>she<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of <S%H376>Man<s%>.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> shall a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>, and shall <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto his <S%H802>wife<s%>: and they shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>.
And they were <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%>, the <S%H120>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and were not <S%H954>ashamed<s%>.
